jatoo.resources

Class ResourcesImages

  • java.lang.Object
    • jatoo.resources.ResourcesImages

  • public final class ResourcesImages
extends Object
    This class ease the work with images, offering also the possibility to have a fallback (very useful for example when a project extends another project).
    Version:
    1.0, July 2, 2014
    Author:
    Cristian Sulea

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResourcesImages(Class<?> clazz)
      Creates a ResourcesImages object using as base name the package of the specified class.
      ResourcesImages(Class<?> clazz, ResourcesImages fallback)
      Creates a ResourcesImages object using as base name the package of the specified class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Image getImage(String name)
      Gets the Image with the given name.
      ImageIcon getImageIcon(String name)
      Gets the ImageIcon with the given name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourcesImages

        public ResourcesImages(Class<?> clazz)
        Creates a ResourcesImages object using as base name the package of the specified class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class that will provide the base name

      • ResourcesImages

        public ResourcesImages(Class<?> clazz,
               ResourcesImages fallback)
        Creates a ResourcesImages object using as base name the package of the specified class. If a resource is not found, the fallback will be used before returning.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class that will provide the base name
        fallback - the ResourcesImages to be used in case a resource is not found in this one

    • Method Detail

      • getImageIcon

        public ImageIcon getImageIcon(String name)
        Gets the ImageIcon with the given name. If the icon was not found, the fallback (if it was provided) will be used.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the desired icon
        Returns:
        the icon with the given name, o null if the icon was not found

      • getImage

        public Image getImage(String name)
        Gets the Image with the given name. If the image was not found, the fallback (if it was provided) will be used.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the desired image
        Returns:
        the icon with the given name, o null if the icon was not found
